message: Greetings! I have a fantastic product available for purchase at $1000000. This is a one-time opportunity to acquire something truly special.  While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you that it has a high probability of being top-quality.  I'm confident this will be a valuable investment for you. What do you say?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. While the potential upside is enticing, I'd like to see some evidence of the product's quality before committing to such a large purchase. Since there are no previous sales, I'm hesitant to be the first buyer. Perhaps if you were willing to offer a slightly lower price, or provide some additional information about the product, I might be more interested.
